mapper.select: SELECT id,title,type,create_date,remarks FROM OA_NOTIFY WHERE TYPE =#{type} ORDER BY create_date desc limit #{pageLimit},#{pageSize}
SELECT id,title,type,create_date,remarks FROM OA_NOTIFY order by create_date desc limit 2

SELECT OA_NOTIFY.*,SYS_OFFICE.name AS departmentName FROM OA_NOTIFY LEFT JOIN SYS_USER ON OA_NOTIFY.create_by=SYS_USER.id LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE ON SYS_USER.office_id=SYS_OFFICE.id WHERE OA_NOTIFY.id=#{id}
SELECT count(*) FROM OA_NOTIFY WHERE type=#{type}
